name: CYBER SONGMAN: RE: BIRTH
description: It's been 3 years since the fall of the cyber world and your exile from the cybermen. You've lost all of your memories, and yet something drives you to regain what you've lost. Yes, that something CYBER SONGMAN, now more critical of your knowledge than ever. Do you have what it takes to clear CYBER SONGMAN's ultimate trial and rejoin the ranks of the cybermen, or will you falter as so many other have before you and suffer the ultimate punishment?
